jade.tools.ascml.gui.dialogs
Class ChooseIconDialog

java.lang.Object
  jade.tools.ascml.gui.dialogs.AbstractDialog
      jade.tools.ascml.gui.dialogs.ChooseIconDialog

public class ChooseIconDialog
extends AbstractDialog

Presents a dialog especially for choosing Societies and AgentTypes. This dialog-class is instantiated by the GUIEventHandler once the user chooses 'Add Society' or 'Add AgentType' from the MenuBar or the JTree-contextmenu. Furthermore this class is instantiated by the ModelNotFoundDialog to let the user manually choose an appropiate model-file.
